and the food and alcohol are delicious as always, 
but there seems to be a lack of overall energy... 

I asked a person named Henry about it indirectly, 
but all they said was that there are 
various things going on.

Everyone working here is beautiful,

I have a lot of respect for Deputy Commander
Heinz. 
Admittedly, he doesn't have the same
awe-inspiring presence as Commander Gerd,

together.

so there might have been a military discussion
or something.

giving orders is really impressive.

MsgJp:
結婚を約束していた彼女が姿を消してからもう半年
僕の心はまだ癒えず、思い出の場所であるあの草原に
昨日も出向いてたんです
そしたらふと、丘の向こうから何か声が聞こえて――
あれは魔物の唸り声だったのか、それとも――
いえ、僕の妄想だってことぐらいわかっているんです
MsgEn:
It has been half a year since she, 
whom I had promised to marry, disappeared.
My heart is still not healed, 
so I went to that grassland, a place of memories.
Yesterday, I went there again,
And then, suddenly, 
I heard a voice from beyond the hill-- 

Was that the growl of a monster, or... 
No, I know it's just my imagination.

MsgJp:
いままで家族全員、つつましくやってきました
多くを望まず、日々祈りを欠かさず――
それなのに、この３日だけで６回ですよ！
魔物の影に追われ、声に怯え、気配に身を竦ませ――
いったい私たちがどんな罪を犯したのですか！
もうこの地に留まる事はできません
MsgEn:
We have lived modestly with our whole family until 
now, desiring little and never missing a prayer.
Yet, in just these three days, six times!
Chased by the shadows of monsters,
terrified by the sounds, 
shivering at every presence—
what sin have we committed?
We can no longer stay here.

Fetching water is important, 
but I'm starting to hate it.
Every time it's my turn, I see strange shadows
or hear odd noises on the way back.
The other day, 
a traveler was attacked by monsters, they say.
This kind of job should be handled 
by someone tougher.

深く立ち入らなければ安全だろうと思っていたら
奥の方から唸り声みたいなものが聞こえて――
だんだん近づいて来たんだ
驚いて、思わず外へ飛び出しちまったよ
MsgEn:
When our travel funds ran out and we were caught in the rain, we had no choice but to take refuge underground. 
I thought it would be safe as long as we didn’t go too deep, 
but then I started hearing a growling noise from further in――
and it kept getting closer. 
I was so startled that I ended up rushing outside.

The surging of life, the echo of violence, 
the resonance of despair! 
Now, let us venture into that abyss once again today. 
Even if I have to dedicate my life, I will do so 
for the sake of these strange melodies!

investigate beforehand and 
provide convenient vanguards.

MsgJp:
不確実な情報だが、<NAME AREA>から
狂暴な魔物のしわざと思われる被害報告があった
MsgEn:
There have been reports of damage believed to be 
caused by violent creatures in 
<NAME AREA>, 
although the information is uncertain.

MsgJp:
あの日から、眠れた夜などありはしねえ
ただの追剥なのか、はては人喰い鬼の仕業なのか
俺んとこの可愛いくて愛くるしい、牛もブタも
みんなどこかに消えちまった
恐怖と悔しさで、ずっと手の震えが止まらねえ
俺の財産全てやる、誰かこの震えを止めてくれ
MsgEn:
Since that day, there hasn't been a single night I could sleep.
Is it just a simple robbery, or perhaps the work of a man-eating demon?
All the cute and lovely cows and pigs in my place,
they all disappeared somewhere.
With fear and frustration, my hands keep trembling nonstop.
I'll give away all of my possessions, someone please make this trembling stop.

MsgJp:
<NAME AREA>では、夜になると現れる
危険な存在により住民が脅かされているらしい
MsgEn:
In the <NAME AREA>, 
it seems that the residents are being threatened 
by a dangerous presence that appears at night.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【 敵出現：夜 】</COL>
ここらの土地はな
長年に渡るオークどもとの戦争で
命を落とした戦士達の亡骸が
たくさん埋葬されているわけよ
だから夜にはあんまり出歩かんほうが賢明だな
どんな事が起きたって、何も不思議じゃねえからよ
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Enemy appears during: Night】</COL>
In this land, the remains of the fallen warriors
who lost their lives in the long war against the orcs
are buried in abundance.
So, it's wise not to wander around at night.
No matter what happens.

MsgEn:

it's best to be fully prepared for an 
enemy assault.

MsgJp:
本当、肝を潰しました
やっと憧れの騎士団に
入ったばかりの最初の任務で
あんな魔物と渡り合うことになるなんて
奴らはきっとまだ、あそこにいると思います
くれぐれもご用心下さい
MsgEn:
I've truly shattered my heart. 
Right after finally joining the knight order 
I've always admired, I'm already confronted with 
battling such creatures. 
I'm certain they are still lingering there, 
so please exercise utmost caution.

MsgEn:
According to reports from <NAME AREA>, 
enemy forces have temporarily increased, 
and the situation is quite dangerous.

MsgJp:
オークどもめ、どうも近頃水面下でなにやら
企んでいるようだが、その実態はまだ掴めて
いない。これは直接《ガルドノック砦》へ向かい
ことの次第を明らかにしなければならないだろう
背後にあの最も臭い奴――総大将モゴックが
絡んでいる可能性も否定できないからな
MsgEn:
It seems that the orc bastards have been scheming 
something under the surface lately, but the true 
nature of their plot is still unknown. 
We must directly head to Gardnox Fortress to 
uncover the details. 
There is also a possibility that the foul 
stinking bastard―Supreme Commander Mogok―
is involved.
